DataElement.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of all responses by an individual to the Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Item Questionnaire (GAD-7).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized survey developed by Robert L. Spitzer and colleagues in 2006 which is used to identify probable cases of generalized anxiety disorder and assess the severity of an individual's symptoms. This instrument consists of 7 items and one follow-up item. Each item is rated on a scale of 0-3 where 0 is 'not at all' and 3 is 'nearly every day.'

Concepts.definition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings.
